## Condition type

Condition clause

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type Condition<MT extends object> = {
    [P in KeyOf<MT>]?: PredicateComparison<MT[P]> | (MT[P] & ShortHandEqualType);
};
```

## Example


```ts
{
  name: {inq: ['John', 'Mary']},
  status: 'ACTIVE',
  age: {gte: 40}
}

```
